api_contracts.description: Returns a simple greeting message with HTTP 200 status code

error_responses.message: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request

component_logic.responsibility: Initializes and configures the HTTP server framework with routing infrastructure

interfaces.description: Create and configure FastAPI application instance with default settings
Register a route handler with the FastAPI application
Start the HTTP server and listen for incoming requests

component_logic.implementation_notes: Use FastAPI 0.104+ for HTTP server framework. Initialize with default settings: host='0.0.0.0', port=8000. Configure CORS if needed. Use uvicorn as ASGI server. Set up logging configuration at startup. Create single global FastAPI app instance.

component_logic.responsibility: Handles GET /hello requests and returns serialized JSON response with greeting message

interfaces.description: Handle GET /hello request and return JSON response with message field
Serialize message string into JSON response dictionary

component_logic.implementation_notes: Create async route handler function decorated with @app.get('/hello'). Return dictionary with single key 'message' and value 'Hello World'. FastAPI automatically serializes to JSON with Content-Type: application/json. Use type hints for response validation. Handler should be stateless and thread-safe.

component_logic.responsibility: Implements error handling and HTTP status code responses for the hello endpoint

interfaces.description: Catch unexpected exceptions and return 500 error response
Validate incoming request is well-formed (check method is GET, path is /hello)
Create standardized error response with status code and error details

component_logic.implementation_notes: Use FastAPI exception handlers with @app.exception_handler(Exception). Catch all unhandled exceptions and return JSONResponse with status_code=500, error_code='INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR', message='An unexpected error occurred while processing the request'. Log exceptions with full traceback for debugging. Return proper HTTP status codes: 200 for success, 500 for server errors. Do not expose internal error details to client.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify HTTP server framework is properly initialized and configured
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: HTTPServerFramework component must initialize FastAPI application with host='0.0.0.0' and port=8000. Server must start without errors and listen for incoming connections.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify route handler is correctly registered and responds to GET /hello
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: HelloRouteHandler must be registered as GET /hello endpoint. Endpoint must be accessible at http://localhost:8000/hello. HTTP method must be GET only (reject POST, PUT, DELETE).

design_review_checklist.description: Verify error handling returns proper HTTP status codes
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Successful requests must return HTTP 200 with JSON response. Unhandled exceptions must return HTTP 500 with error_code='INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR'. All error responses must be valid JSON.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify response serialization returns correct JSON format
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Response must be valid JSON with Content-Type: application/json header. Response body must contain exactly: {"message": "Hello World"}. No extra fields or nested structures.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify exception handling does not expose internal details
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Error responses must not include stack traces or internal error details. All exceptions must be caught and logged server-side. Client receives only generic error message.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify all semantic units from project plan have corresponding components
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: SU-001 (HTTP server setup) maps to HTTPServerFramework. SU-002 (GET /hello handler) maps to HelloRouteHandler. SU-003 (error handling) maps to ErrorHandler. All dependencies between components match project plan dependencies.

architecture_overview: Simple 3-component architecture for a basic HTTP server. HTTPServerFramework initializes and configures the FastAPI application with routing infrastructure. HelloRouteHandler implements the GET /hello endpoint that returns a JSON response with the message 'Hello World'. ErrorHandler wraps the route handler with exception handling to catch unexpected errors and return appropriate HTTP 500 responses. The server listens on 0.0.0.0:8000 and responds to GET requests at /hello with JSON serialized responses.
assumptions: Server runs on localhost with host 0.0.0.0 and port 8000
Only GET requests are accepted at /hello endpoint
Response is always JSON format with Content-Type: application/json
No authentication or authorization required for /hello endpoint
No database or external service dependencies needed
Unhandled exceptions are logged server-side and return generic 500 error to client
FastAPI automatically handles request/response serialization and HTTP status codes
